title: Kennen needs an update.
body:
His model is arguably the worst in the game. His kit is very outdated, and could at least benefit from a range indicator on his W. 

I hear about updates for WW, a character redefine for Poppy, and a Taric VU - but let's face it. Now that Sion's and Heimerdinger's updates are done, Kennen is the one who needs it the most.

replies.body: Ken has no damage and he runs out of energy after one combo leaving himself useless for the rest of the fight. He is in the top 3 champs needing a complete rework right now, especially with the new items and a million easy ways to counter him.
No, Taric definitely needs it the most. I would say Urgot, but he needs a Sion-style redo as well, so that could take longer.
